oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Slide Show - The Unfulfilled Dream: A History of Race Relations and Civil Rights in Memphis since the Civil War
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Memphis, Tennessee; civil rights; race relations;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: 162 photographic slides, a script and an audio recording from a presentation given by Thomas Faist in 1982. [Slide 144 is missing.]
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Faist, Thomas
